author: Michael S. Derby
title: Fed’s Bostic Says He Expects More Gradual Rate Rises Over Rest of 2018
text:
Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said Friday the economy is facing upside risks to activity over coming years, and that’s why he’s supportive of pressing forward with interest rate rises.
“If the economy evolves roughly as I suspect, I will likely support further increases over the course of the year,” Mr. Bostic said in the text of a speech to be presented before an event in Knoxville, Tenn. “Though I expect that a sequence of further rate hikes will be appropriate over the next couple of years, that...
